problem.markdown:
>>In this class, we define the purpose of an operation in the manufacturing process is to: <<
( )Change the state of a material. (x)Bring a workpiece closer to a state in which it can be sold. ( )Change the physical form of a material. ( )Assemble parts to realize a final product. [Explanation] To assemble, change the state or physical form of a material is involved in manufacturing process but not sufficient because the market is the driving force of manufacturing. [Explanation]
